definition: a word that expresses a meaning opposed to the meaning of another word, in which case the two words are antonyms of each other
details:
noun
- a word that expresses a meaning opposed to the meaning of another word, in which case the two words are antonyms of each other
= example: a word that expresses a meaning opposed to the meaning of another word, in which case the two words are antonyms of each other
= synonyms: opposite
